snippet: DeMarre Carroll scored 16 of his 18 points in the first half, Paul Millsap had 17 points and the Atlanta Hawks beat the Brooklyn Nets 98-75 Friday night for their fifth straight victory....

headline.print_headline: Hawks Rout Nets 98-75 for 5th Straight Victory
headline.main: Hawks Rout Nets 98-75 for 5th Straight Victory

lead_paragraph: DeMarre Carroll scored 16 of his 18 points in the first half, Paul Millsap had 17 points and the Atlanta Hawks beat the Brooklyn Nets 98-75 Friday night for their fifth straight victory.
